content.name: Cold-blooded
content.description: Ignore modifiers (pos or neg) to bravery of Coalesced units.

content.name: Predatory Fighters
content.description: Add **1** to the Attacks of jaw weapons of Coalesced units.

content.name: Primeval Domain
content.description: If a terrain feature is partially or wholly within the territory of Coalesced, it has Mystical and Deadly Mysterious Terrain scenery rules. This is in addition to any other Mysterious Terrain scenery rules it may have. The Mystical rules apply to Coalesced, and the Deadly Mysterious rules apply to others.

content.name: Scaly Skin
content.description: **Subtract 1** from dmg from each successful attack on Coalesced unit (to min of 1).

content.name: Beastmaster
content.description: Once per battle in your hero phase, you can declare this mount will be either **swift** or **savage**. For **swift** until next hero phase can run and still shoot and/or charge in same turn. For **savage** until next hero phase, **add 1** to attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by mount.
